thread.title: Plans for Victoria Avenue tunnel
thread.title_full: Plans for Victoria Avenue tunnel | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Plans for Victoria Avenue tunnel
text:
An islander has published ambitious plans to build a tunnel over a stretch of Victoria Avenue in Jersey.
An online campaign group, called 'Peoples Gardens' is calling for a car park to be built on Lower Park - the stretch of grass between Victoria Avenue and St Aubin's Inner Road.
The proposed car park structure, which would be covered with grass, would also cover both lanes of the Avenue.
Speaking about how the project will be funded a 'People's Gardens' spokeperson said:
Funding for the whole project will be raised based on securing a peppercorn rent lease from the Parish of St Helier for the car park, with that in place private funding will be sought to deliver a car park with the ark over the top.
â€“ People's Gardens How the tunnel would look going over Victoria Avenue Credit: Peoples Gardens Last updated Tue 28 Jersey
